column.name: SendMultipleInvites
column.summary: Enum:SendMultipleInvites . Whether we are able to send multiple invites.

Enumeration.name: SendMultipleInvites
Enumeration.summary: The different modes in which we will send a patient portal invite for this rule.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - Send a patient portal invite if the patient has not visited patient portal before.
1 - Send a patient portal invite every appointment.
2 - Send a patient portal invite if the patient hasn't visited patient portal within TimeSpanMultipleInvites pref.

column.name: TimeSpanMultipleInvites
column.summary: Used in conjunction with CanSendMultipleInvites. We will not send an invite if a patient has visited Patient Portal within this timespan.

column.name: Rate3Hours
column.summary: This is a manual override for Rate3Auto. Typically -1 hour (-01:00:00) to indicate no override. When used as override, allowed values are zero or positive. This is the portion of the hours worked which are at Rate3, so it's not in addition to the hours worked. Also used to calculate the Rate3 OT.

column.name: Rate3Auto
column.summary: Automatically calculated Rate3 pay. Will be zero if none.

column.name: FKeyType
column.summary: Enum:DbmLogFKeyType The type of log.

Enumeration.name: DbmLogFKeyType
Enumeration.EnumValue: This means FKey will link to DiscountPlanSub.
This means FKey will link to ProvNum

column.name: DateTimeUploaded
column.summary: The time this log was uploaded.

column.name: EServiceCode
column.summary: Enum:eServiceCode EService that this short GUID applies to.

Enumeration.name: eServiceCode
Enumeration.summary: Used by EServiceSignal.ServiceCode. Each service will have an entry here. Stored as an int for forward compatibility.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 40 - Used for storing customers license agreement acceptance signature.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 212 - Permission for managing high security program properties.
213 - Logs when a patient's credit card is edited.
214 - Allows user to edit medication definitions.
215 - Allows user to edit allergy definitions.
216 - Allows user to setup and use Advertising features like Postcards.

column.name: ApptSource
column.summary: Enum:EServiceTypes .

Enumeration.name: EServiceTypes
Enumeration.EnumValue: Used by the OpenDentalService. Not a eService but we need the "phantom" user to behave like eService users.

column.name: ImageDrawNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: DocNum
column.summary: FK to document.DocNum

column.name: MountNum
column.summary: FK to mount.MountNum

column.name: ColorDraw
column.summary: For text, this is the foreground color. For lines, this is the color, and ColorBack is not used.

column.name: ColorBack
column.summary: Background color for text. Can be Transparent (0,255,255,255).

column.name: DrawingSegment
column.summary: Point data for a drawing segment. The format would look similar to this: 45,68;48,70;49,72;0,0;55,88;etc. It's simply a sequence of points, separated by semicolons. Only positive numbers are used. 0,0 is the upper left of the image or mount. Cropping is ignored. Floats with tenths can be included. If the pen is picked up, it becomes a new segment, so a new row in the database.

column.name: DrawText
column.summary: The location of the text in pixels is incorporated into this string. Example: 25,123;This shows. Carriage returns etc are not supported. ColorDraw and FontSize are also used. Unlike tooth initial, this does not support floats.

column.name: FontSize
column.summary: This could vary significantly based on the size of the image.

column.name: DrawType
column.summary: Enum:ImageDrawType

Enumeration.name: ImageDrawType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - Location and string, combined
1 - A series of straight lines, stored the same as a pen drawing.
2 - One continuous segment of a drawing.

column.name: DeviceType
column.summary: Enum:EnumImgDeviceType

Enumeration.name: EnumImgDeviceType
Enumeration.summary: Order cannot change, since we store in db as enum number. But we show the list in the UI in a different order or our choosing.

column.name: ActionType
column.summary: Enum:eActionType Stores the intended action associated to this rows data.

Enumeration.name: eActionType
Enumeration.summary: Actions representing different endpoints in mobile app.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 2 - Instructs eClipboard to present patient with payment window.

column.name: UserNumOrthoLocked
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. A real-time flag of which user is currently editing the Orth Chart. Prevents concurrency issues. 0 indicates unlocked.

column.name: EmailResponse
column.summary: Email address used for a requested receipt provided by the user when making a payment via the patient portal.

column.name: MobileAppDeviceNum
column.summary: A FK to the mobile app device that the PayPlan is currently on.

column.name: IsHighSecurity
column.summary: Is true if the program property is a high security property. False by default.

column.name: ScheduledAction
column.summary: Enum:ScheduledActionEnum

Enumeration.name: ScheduledActionEnum
Enumeration.summary: Action to be selected by user when scheduling. When adding a new value to this Enum add a case for it in the ScheduledProcessThread in OpendentalService and a method to handle the action.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 212 - Permission for managing high security program properties.
213 - Logs when a patient's credit card is edited.
214 - Allows user to edit medication definitions.
215 - Allows user to edit allergy definitions.
216 - Allows user to setup and use Advertising features like Postcards.

column.name: AutoCheckSaveImage
column.summary: Indicates whether sheets created with this sheet def load with the "Save to Images" box checked

column.name: FKeyType
column.summary: Enum:KeyType Describes the type of object referenced by the FKey.

Enumeration.name: KeyType
Enumeration.summary: Do not combine with SignalType, they must be seperate. Stored as string, safe to reorder enum values.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 12 - Indicates Signalod pertains to a specific UserOd.

column.name: IType
column.summary: Enum:InvalidType Indicates what cache or entity has been changed.

Enumeration.name: InvalidType
Enumeration.summary: When the autorefresh message is sent to the other computers, this is the type.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 100. Used for refreshing user preferences.
101. Used internally by OD HQ.
102. Used to refresh the Account Module for a specific patient.

column.name: StmtLinkType
column.summary: Enum:StmtLinkTypes Represents what object FKey corresponds to.

Enumeration.name: StmtLinkTypes
Enumeration.EnumValue: 4 - Pay plan charge

column.name: HasWeekendRate3
column.summary: Indicates if the employee is eligible to earn Rate3 rate for weekend hours.

column.name: Signature
column.summary: Obfuscated string containing when and who accepted the license agreement.

column.name: FkeyType
column.summary: Enum:UserOdFkeyType Specifies which flag is overridden for the specified definition, since an individual definition can have multiple flags.

Enumeration.name: UserOdFkeyType
Enumeration.summary: These FKey Types are to be used as an identifier for what table the Fkey column is associated to, or what type of override it is. Not always associated to a database table. Example: TaskCollapse,SuppressLogOffMessage,AcctProcBreakdown. Do not reorder items, since they are numbers in the db.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 26 - Sets whether tasks popups that are blocked still play the sound notification. If true, sound will play. If false, sound will be blocked as well.

column.name: BatchTotal
column.summary: BatchTotal. Stores the BatchTotal from XCharge. This is a cumulative value for all transactions up to this row in the same batch. BatchTotal from the last transaction in a batch should match the sum of all the Amount fields for the same batch

column.name: EmailResponse
column.summary: Email address used for a requested receipt provided by the user when making a payment via the patient portal.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.

column.name: ActionType
column.summary: Enum:eActionType Stores the intended action associated to this rows data.

Enumeration.name: eActionType
Enumeration.summary: Actions representing different endpoints in mobile app.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
